montages2

PURPOSE

MONTAGES2 [4D] Used to display R sets of T images each.

SYNOPSIS

function varargout = montages2( IS, montage2prms, padSiz )

DESCRIPTION 

 MONTAGES2 [4D] Used to display R sets of T images each.

 Displays one montage (see montage2) per row.  Each of the R image sets is
 flattened to a single long image by concatenating the T images in the
 set. Alternative to montages.

 USAGE
  varargout = montages2( IS, [montage2prms], [padSiz] )

 INPUTS
  IS            - MxNxTxR or MxNx1xTxR or MxNx3xTxR array
  montage2prms  - [] params for montage2; ex: {showLns,extraInf}
  padSiz        - [4] total amount of vertical or horizontal padding

 OUTPUTS
  I             - 3D or 4D array of flattened images, disp with montage2
  mm            - #montages/row
  nn            - #montages/col

 EXAMPLE
  load( 'images.mat' );
  imageclusters = clustermontage( images, IDXi, 16, 1 );
  montages2( imageclusters );

 See also MONTAGES, MAKEMOVIES, MONTAGE2, CLUSTERMONTAGE

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:

0003 % Displays one montage (see montage2) per row.  Each of the R image sets is
0004 % flattened to a single long image by concatenating the T images in the
0005 % set. Alternative to montages.
0006 %
0007 % USAGE
0008 %  varargout = montages2( IS, [montage2prms], [padSiz] )

0010 % INPUTS
0011 %  IS            - MxNxTxR or MxNx1xTxR or MxNx3xTxR array

0023 %  montages2( imageclusters );

0027 % Piotr's Image&Video Toolbox      Version 1.5
0028 % Written and maintained by Piotr Dollar    pdollar-at-cs.ucsd.edu
0029 % Please email me if you find bugs, or have suggestions or questions!
0030 
0031 function varargout = montages2( IS, montage2prms, padSiz )
0032 
0033 if( nargin<2 || isempty(montage2prms) ); montage2prms = {}; end
0034 if( nargin<3 || isempty(padSiz) ); padSiz = 4; end
0035 [padSiz,er] = checknumericargs( padSiz,[1 1], 0, 1 ); error(er);
0036 
0037 % get/test image format info
0038 nd = ndims(IS); siz = size(IS);
0039 if( nd==5 )  %MxNx1xTxR or MxNx3xTxR
0040   nch = size(IS,3);
0041   if( nch~=1 && nch~=3 ); error('illegal image stack format'); end
0042   if( nch==1 ); IS = squeeze(IS); nd=4; siz=size(IS); end
0043 end
0044 if ~any(nd==3:5)
0045   error('unsupported dimension of IS');
0046 end
0047 
0048 % reshape IS so that each 3D element is concatenated to a 2D image, adding
0049 % padding
0050 padEl = max(IS(:));
0051 IS=arraycrop2dims(IS, [siz(1)+padSiz siz(2:end)], padEl ); %UD pad
0052 siz=size(IS);
0053 if(nd==3) % reshape bw single
0054   IS=squeeze( reshape( IS, siz(1), [] ) );
0055 elseif(nd==4) % reshape bw
0056   IS=squeeze( reshape( IS, siz(1), [], siz(4) ) );
0057 else % reshape color
0058   IS=squeeze( reshape(permute(IS,[1 2 4 3 5]),siz(1),[],siz(3),siz(5)));
0059 end; siz = size(IS);
0060 IS=arraycrop2dims(IS, [siz(1) siz(2)+padSiz siz(3:end)], padEl);  
0061 
0062 % show using montage2
0063 varargout = cell(1,nargout);
0064 if( nargout); varargout{1}=IS; end;
0065 [varargout{2:end}] = montage2( IS, montage2prms{:} );
0066 title(inputname(1));
